Jane Doe's Father experienced and will continue to experience great mental anguish, pain and suffering from the time that Defendant's tortious conduct occurred. WHEREFORE, Plaintiff Jane Doe's Father demands judgment for loss of consortium damages, costs and such other and further relief as this Court deems proper. JURY TRIAL DEMAND Plaintiffs demand a jury trial in this action. Dated: January 24, 2008 Respectfully submitted, HERMAN & MERMELSTEIN, P.A.
